title: Uproar after Hopedale officer allegedly runs over ‘Rocky Raccoon’
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News The police department issued a statement backing the officer’s decision and urged residents not to dox him.

title: GoFundMe launched for family after college student dies in Needham fire
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News The fundraiser aims to help the displaced family rebuild after the deadly Christmas Eve blaze.
Kayla Corrigan died in a Dec.
24 house fire in Needham, according to the GoFundMe started for her family.
